for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = []
    for i in range(n):
        (s, p, v) = map(int, input().split())
        s = s + 1
        l.append(p // s * v)
    print(max(l))

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    n = int(input())
    pf = 0
    while n != 0:
        (s, p, v) = map(int, input().split())
        pr = v * (p // (s + 1))
        if pr > pf:
            pf = pr
        n -= 1
    print(pf)
    t -= 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = []
    import math
    for i in range(n):
        (a, b, c) = map(int, input().split())
        x = c * math.floor(b / (a + 1))
        l.append(x)
    print(max(l))

import math
t = int(input())
for t in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    maximumIs = []
    for i in range(n):
        (s, p, v) = map(int, input().split())
        k = v * math.floor(p / (s + 1))
        maximumIs.append(k)
    print(max(maximumIs))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    S = []
    V = []
    P = []
    for i in range(N):
        (x, y, z) = map(int, input().split())
        S.append(x)
        P.append(y)
        V.append(z)
    B = []
    i = 0
    while i < N:
        B.append(P[i] // (S[i] + 1) * V[i])
        i += 1
    print(max(B))

import math as math
t = int(input())
for case in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    resource = []
    for line in range(n):
        info = input().split()
        resource.append(info)

    def calcmoney(index):
        moneylist.append(math.floor(int(resource[index][1]) / (int(resource[index][0]) + 1)) * int(resource[index][2]))
    moneylist = []
    for i in range(n):
        calcmoney(i)
    print(int(max(moneylist)))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = []
    for i in range(n):
        arr.append([int(i) for i in input().split()])
    p = []
    r = 0
    for i in arr:
        r = i[1] // (i[0] + 1) * i[2]
        p.append(r)
    p.sort()
    print(p[-1])
